meanings.meaning: 1. to weave up into fabric 自分が集めた事実をもとにして、科学者は、その事実に意味と秩序と価値を与える論理の模様すなわち理論を織りあげるのである。Around his facts the scientist weaves a logical pattern or theory which gives the facts meaning, order, and significance.

meanings.meaning: 1. Shiki
1. organization; organisation; formation 役員評議会が組織されて新提案を協議した。An executive council was formed to discuss the new proposal.
2. structure; construction; setup; constitution もっとも重要なことは、脳にはこれらの解剖学的組織を結合する全体的な再入経路が必要である。Most important of all, the brain needs global reentry pathways connecting these anatomical structures.
3. system (e.g. railroad, transport, party, etc.) 党幹部らは、党組織の欠陥問題に取り組んでいます。Party leaders are grappling with flaws in the party system.
4. tissue Biology次の議論は出生前の組織移植に関するものである。The next discussion concerns the transplantation of prenatal tissues.
5. texture (of a rock) Geology, See also 石理
6. weave (of a fabric)
組織 【そしょく】、組職 【そしき】、組職 【そしょく】
そしょく: Out-dated or obsolete kana usage. 組職: Irregular kanji usage. そしょく: Out-dated or obsolete kana usage. 組職: Irregular kanji usage.

sentences.translation: An executive council was formed to discuss the new proposal.
Most important of all, the brain needs global reentry pathways connecting these anatomical structures.
Party leaders are grappling with flaws in the party system.
The next discussion concerns the transplantation of prenatal tissues.
